answers.answer: Did you acquire the bacterimia in the hospital, are you still taking antibiotics?Do you have an Endocrinologist that you see for your diabetes? Neuropathy from your diabetes could be making your back pain worse.You need to see your Doctor as soon as you can, or call an Ambulance if you have too, don't take any chances with your health. Let us know how you are.Take Care
